title: Phase Canon — Recompiled
subtitle: Phase 0 and the enforced ontology of Phase / Variant / Sub-Current / Marker
description: A canonical recompilation of the Ousia Bloom phase system. Structure is preserved; descriptions reflect a new understanding. Explicitly not a self-diagnostic tool; an ontology for phases, variants, sub-currents, and markers.
excerpt: NOT A SELF Diagnostic tool a record of becoming

associatedMedia.description: Screenshot of Substack post header and opening section.
associatedMedia.altText: Phase Canon — Recompiled on Wanderer's Burn (Substack), dated Jan 26, 2026.

integrity.notes: Filename: phase-canon-recompiled.phase-the-ousia-bloom.metadata.v2.6.1.json. Schema v2.6.1. Forward-only from demarcation 2026-01-26; no backfill. Phase sequence intentionally excluded. Canon phases per bloom.phase-canon.recompiled.2026-01-26.txt.
